thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: NYPD Identifies Body of Dismembered Brooklyn Woman

author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: NYPD Identifies Body of Dismembered Brooklyn Woman

organizations.name: dismembered brooklyn woman the new york police department

text:
The New York Police Department on Wednesday morning identified the Brooklyn woman whose dismembered body was found in the Canarsie neighborhood earlier this week.
The severed body of Brandy Odom, 26 years old, was discovered in Canarsie Park on Monday afternoon.
A 52-year-old woman was walking her dog at about 6 p.m. near East 86th Street...
